China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2023 年 12 月 26 日星期二 11:33:05 GMT 120
Big oil enters 2024 strengthened by U.S. industry consolidationThe oil and gas industry went on a $250 billion buying spree in 2023, taking advantage of companies' high stock prices to secure lower-cost reserves and prepare for the next upheaval in an industry likely to undergo more consolidation. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 11:02:44 GMT MOALFKIJPROM5EDA2P27WHBE3Q https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/big-oil-enters-2024-strengthened-by-us-industry-consolidation-2023-12-26/Gary Mcwilliams商业活力
Taiwan presidential frontrunner accuses opposition party of being 'pro-communist'The frontrunner to be Taiwan's next president accused the main opposition party of betraying the anti-communist ideals of its forefathers and being overtly pro-China, ahead of next month's election. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 09:20:59 GMT 6Q2G4A4Z2NMFDBBBPII7PGVHVU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-presidential-frontrunner-accuses-opposition-party-being-pro-communist-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
China cracks down on hundreds of millions of dollars of government investment scamsChinese police this year have cracked down on hundreds of millions of dollars of fraud cases using fabricated government documents to attract investment in fake national projects, state media reported on Tuesday. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 08:47:18 GMT NR36RAWA25LK3N3F2RP4KNQFKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-cracks-down-hundreds-millions-dollars-government-investment-scams-2023-12-26/Reuters世界中国
AstraZeneca to buy China's Gracell Biotechnologies in $1.2 billion dealAstraZeneca said on Tuesday it will buy Gracell Biotechnologies for up to $1.2 billion as the Anglo-Swedish pharma company furthers its cell therapy ambitions and boosts its presence in China, the world's second-largest pharmaceuticals market. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 07:13:22 GMT AMGHYV62QJNSHJTNNEB6UCWBF4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/aztrazeneca-buy-china-based-gracell-biotechnologies-12-bln-deal-2023-12-26/Reuters市场交易
Chinese gaming firms unveil share buybacks after regulatory move unnerves investorsA slew of smaller Chinese gaming companies have announced share buybacks - plans seen as an attempt to reassure investors after the market was spooked by regulatory moves to clamp down on consumer spending on games. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 05:49:12 GMT EK2D2WVFANLENHJ6YKJ7BCCZO4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-gaming-firms-unveil-share-buybacks-after-regulatory-move-unnerves-2023-12-26/Li Gu, Casey Hall世界中国
Philippines is not provoking conflict in South China Sea, its military saysThe Philippines is not provoking conflict in the South China Sea, its military spokesperson said on Tuesday, responding to China's accusation that Manila was encroaching on Beijing's territory. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 05:14:50 GMT UBX2WSIGXBJJHAJL7XJYTQ44XU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-not-provoking-conflict-south-china-sea-military-spokesperson-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
China expects searing heat, more weather extremes in 2024China - grappling with one of its coldest Decembers on record - will likely have to brace for another round of scorching heat and an increase in extreme weather next year due to the El Nino weather phenomenon, a senior climate expert said. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 04:49:05 GMT H2EF2YAKGRKSHE7PF6IZCSENAI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-expects-searing-heat-more-weather-extremes-2024-2023-12-26/Liz Lee世界中国
Taiwan not seeing signs of large-scale Chinese military activity pre-electionTaiwan is not seeing any signs of large-scale Chinese military activity before elections next month but is keeping a close watch on China, the island's defence ministry said on Tuesday. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 04:07:50 GMT NQS6HJDMN5M2RBDOQJ4UBFTMB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-not-seeing-signs-large-scale-chinese-military-activity-pre-election-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
China warns rocket remnants to hit South China SeaChina warned that remnants of a rocket would hit an area in the South China Sea on Tuesday, following the sixth deployment of its most powerful launch vehicle eleven days ago. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 01:39:57 GMT TBHRLQLGCJPELGK6EVQXXIFXVA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-warns-rocket-remnants-hit-south-china-sea-maritime-safety-authority-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
China to provide consular assistance to Vivo employees arrested in IndiaChina will provide consular protection and assistance to two Chinese employees of smartphone maker Vivo arrested by Indian authorities and urges India not to discriminate against Chinese companies, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 08:59:54 GMT TIARG5RVI5KTRMIYGJN4YFHTRE https://www.reuters.com/world/india/china-provide-consular-assistance-vivo-employees-arrested-india-2023-12-25/Reuters世界印度
Christmas in China brings glittering decor and foreign influence concernsGiant Christmas trees adorned with lights, tinsel and gift boxes greet shoppers at glittering malls in big Chinese cities, but in many parts of China, extending season's greetings is out of the question. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 05:30:59 GMT AHZ5DQYFLVP3HFF4NCSN2TKEZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/christmas-china-brings-glittering-decor-foreign-influence-concerns-2023-12-25/Ryan Woo世界中国
